greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Greatest prime factor of sum of divisors of n, for n >= 2; a(1) = 1.
comment: a(n) is the greatest noncomposite factor of the sum of divisors of n. (Cf. A008578.) - _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 11 2018
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==1, 1, my(f = factor(sigma(n))); f[#f~,1]); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 21 2014
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 15 2002
ext: Name clarified by _David A. Corneth_ and _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 11 2018
